The quarterly debt service for Tranche 2 on 31 December 2020 is calculated as follows:

- Interest only period: 5 years until 31 Dec 2018
- Amortization period starts on 31 Mar 2019 and lasts 15 quarters (3.75 years)

- Remaining principal at opening of quarter on 31 Dec 2020: $25 million - 7 * $1.6667 million = approximately $13.3333 million
- Interest for the quarter at 8.5% annual rate on 30/360 basis: $13.3333 million * 8.5% * (90/360) = approximately $0.2833 million
- Total quarterly debt service = principal repayment + interest = $1.6667 million + $0.2833 million = approximately $1.95 million
